name: RSK
review: The brush is a little awkward and it took me a long time to get the makeup on and to get even lines. But once I got it on, it was absolutely gorgeous! Well worth the extra work!

name: So Sunny Sue
review: Just difficult to use and once it was on, didn't stay, so a lot of work for no return.  Which, speaking of, I should have just returned it.

name: Multi-tasking mum
review: Eyeliner is really nice but the product starts drying iut once opened for use..and the clumpy texture is difficult to remove from brush

name: Kat
review: I wear this product on hot and humid Ohio summer days, and it absolutely does not smudge or run. In other words, no raccoon eyes!  I had sworn off all eyeliner (even the high end brands) due to the fact that they all run (and because my eyelids get oily), but this eyeliner absolutely stays put even in muggy midwestern weather.  Thank you Revlon!

name: Immy
review: I bought this in charcoal and my sister promptly went out and bought her own in jet black. I wear a bunch of colors with mine whereas she uses the Naked palette from Urban Decay, and it goes great with both styles. It's very easy to apply and doesn't run, even when my pinewood allergies are acting up. It's cheap enough that it's not a big loss on your pocket book if you're experimenting with something other than a pencil for the first time. I do recommend this one.

name: Stephanie O
review: Bought this as my first gel eyeliner ever, mainly because they were out of the Revlon ColorStay Liquid Eyeliner (which is phenomonal BeeTeaDubs) I'm Pleased to say the least, like this product for lower lid, not on top though :/

name: adslkf
review: Although I havent tried very many eyeliner but i can tell this gel eyeliner is the worst one by far. It fades and never sets. It also smudges a lot when worn even for a short period of time.

name: Pretty Mommy
review: Good for thick  or smoky look

name: Lauren
review:
I do not wear much make up but I always line the top rim of my eyelids to make my eyelashes look fuller. I have been searching for a long-lasting eyeliner that is easy to apply but also easy to take off when I screw up. This is it! Revlon Colorstay has the perfect balance of permanent but fixable.
The amount in the jar lasts a long time so you really get a lot for what you purchase. The creme goes on very smoothly. It is a little bit more difficult to draw thin lines because of the brush design.
One reviewer complained that if you try to add multiple coats the second coat rubs off the first. From my experience as long as you wait for the first coat to dry you should not have problems adding multiple layers of this eyeliner.
This eyeliner lasts all day for me. I use the charcoal color. It has a bit of a shimmer to it, especially when you are outside. When I surf or swim my friends always ask how my eyeliner is still perfect. It doesn't smudge or run in the heat either.

Thank you Revlon for making a product that actually stays on for a long time!!!!

name: Squirlly Shirley
review: Hesitant about trying a gel eyeliner but was pleasantly surprised by the ease of use and great results with this product!  Have already gone back for two other colors!!

name: Alyssa
review: I like the form; having the brush built in to the bottle was convenient. I also like that you can get a soft smudgy look or a more defined look, and this liner will not run away unless you accidentally touch it. BUT it quickly got kind of thick and pasty and though I still wear it, its hard to get it to go on evenly. Its clumpy but also not darkly pigmented enough, so I get dark blobs and then light spots that I have to go back over three times. I wish there was more pigment and a little bit thinner consistency. I am going to try a different brand next time.

name: Wandella
review: Didn't go on as easy as I expected. I guess the word "gel" does not mean  "glides " on.  Was trying to stay away from tugging with a pencil but the gel was worse

name: Joan
review: Didn't go on like any eyeliner I had ever used. Wanted that color, but the store I usually go to did not carry the Revlon Skinny Liquid Eyeliner.

name: Deisy
review: Used during the day but it just runs down . When applying not pigmented, third tried still not good

name: casper teacher
review: The applicator on this product should be redesigned.  The product is too waxy to apply in an even line.

name: MGsVisions
review: I love this product when I need tear proof, or sweat proof make up, it stays on til you take it off, but comes off easily when you do remove it. I was leery about using a gel, but it's easy to apply to my 50+ eyelids, so it's "easy on the eyes" :)

name: MsPaLa
review: Unfortunately this did not work for me. I noticed during the day I had one winged eye the other had completely come off. It faded quickly. The applicator brush was a little complicated for me at first. Will not repurchase

name: Ally_Boo
review: This product could be better

name: Fran
review: Hard to apply. Would not buy again

name: kate
review: I have super oily eyelids and all other gel eyeliners I've used transfer onto the top of my eye. So I picked this up since I've used other color stay products that worked really well. This product doesn't transfer, but it's absolutely impossible to get on. I don't like the brush that comes with it either. But regardless of the brush I use to apply it, it just won't go on.

name: E
review: LOVE love love this product. Only bad thing about it was that I did not like the brush. Used my own small angle brush to apply the eyeliner

name: Mar
review: I tried this product when I ran out of the eye gel I use. I really like it, however, not stays on throughout the day and it runs.

name: Turnthetables2
review: It goes on and dries nicely but needs to be reapplied later in the day.  It's the best I've found so far.

name: nancy
review: the oriduct is very nice it is very easy to apply and it last all day I really love it

name: apat
review: While trying to apply this it seemed hard at first.  And I missed some gaps and had to go over it again, but I don't wear much makeup do I may just be inexperienced.

name: Haneul
review: I mean the pigmentation of the eyeliner definitely isn't the best, but the fact that it actually lasts all day on my eye, whether I am sweating, crying, oiling, or any other thing, makes it so awesome. I love that I never have to  check the mirror throughout the day because I know it wouldn't smudge under eye, or on the crease. Recommend for people who have no time to correct makeup throughout the day!

name: Ggurl
review: I purchased this product with my own money. I was very disappointed to find that this product did not deliver with the pigment I was hoping for. Sure, it's a drugstore brand, but like I said - I was hoping for more! It glides on nicely, stays put in general(especially with eyeshadow base), but it is not a true black; rather, it is more of a watered down black color. It reminds me of painting with black watercolor, which isn't my style. I have noticed this makes for a nice eyeshadow base to apply black shadow on top of or another shadow that you want to make look darker. Otherwise, this is going into my "meh" makeup pile! Would not purchase again.

name: Faith Bazile
review: I like that they tried something new with the stick design but I wasn't very comfortable in hand. besides that, it didn't go on smoothly at all,  it actually came out a bit clumpy and blotchy... sorry but not impressed

name: Georgia
review: This product clumps while going on.  I think it might be the brush,Mobutu it is awful

name: Lori
review: My eyes water a lot so eyeliner has always been a problem until now.  I still have liner at the end of the day with one application in the morning!

name: Tobaccofree
review: Wanted to try this, but was very disappointed.  The product is too gooey and the tip is much too wide.

name: lrausche
review: I have used just about every eyeliner you can think of (Urban Decay, Makeup Forever, Clinique, Revlon, Loreal, etc) and I have NEVER used anything with this kind of staying power.  This stufff is amazing.  It doesn't budge, smudge or travel.  I put it on before work in the morning and it's still exactly how I drew it at night when I go to take off my makeup.  The colors are rich and true and it goes on very smooth.  I have nothing negative to say about this product.  Try it, you will love it!!

name: Sxysadie
review: this product was dried out when I opened it! and the opening for the jar was so small I could barely fit my brush in it.  Tho, they do provide you with a brush, those ones are never any good, so I didnt even use it. FAIL

name: beautybiz
review: Overall, pretty pleased with this--the applicator is a smart idea, because you'll never lose the brush again. Glides on nicely, but as w/all eyeliner like this, you need a steady hand. The black can look a little harsh for daytime.

name: Maggie
review: easy to use product and doesn't pull on the delicate eye area

name: JRPM
review: I would buy this product again.

name: Manu
review: very good!

name: Juzadiva
review: I already love Revlon lipsticks. They are just great. This color (Violet Frenzy) is so hot I got so many compliments on it. I really wish they would keep this shade.

name: Vic
review: Not true to color on tube. Wears off in about 1/2 hr.  So shiny/frosty...stuff I wore as a teen in the 80's..

name: Hannah Elisabeth
review: I love this product, they definitely have the best selection of shades!

name: lormj
review: I thought this would be a fine point thin brush to draw a line close to the lash line - I have heard a lot about gel liner and was hoping to achieve that effect- unfortunately the brush is kind of thick so it is very difficult to create a slim straight line... you get more of a thick line that you could smudge easily for a smoky look if you do it quickly, after a minute it sets and stays put relatively well. But the brush is just too thick- was hard to create even lines that matched both eyes too.

name: kaelint
review: I like the color on this product really well. I have green eyes and it really brings out the color without making it too dramatic. My only complaint is it doesn't last all day (but what product REALLY does?) and the applicator is a little thick, makes it hard to define any lines. But the actual crème is good.

name: Hurricaned
review: Some gel products come with separate applicator, like  we need more stuff to look for in our purse or bathroom!  This product makes gel application easy with applicator in one.  Works great, stays on and looks great!

name: Butch
review: Found it difficult to apply. Not able to soften edges.

name: Mrs. B.
review: I have paid much more for top name creme eyeliners yet this one beats them all. LOVE that the brush conceals in the handle--no mess.

name: garden girl
review: great longlasting eyeliner

name: Sweetie
review: Tried this for the first time, I would definitely buy this again

name: 5280 Girl
review: I have to say that this is by far one of the worst gel eyeliners I have ever used. The gel is easy to apply at first but if u need to add more product to make it thicker or darker, it will just fade the gel that you've already placed. The color is not very dark and it runs or fades very quickly. Once I place it, I leave it for a few and then try to curl my lashes, it completely removes the gel. I've used primer, makeup setting spray, and concealer- this product just refuses to last. AWFUL product that I will never buy again.

name: preciosa
review: This was my second gel liner I purchased . Previously had tried ELF and the quality between that and this one is not much different.  I purchased black and its not as dark as I would like it. It applies "ok" but to me fades throughout the day. You get what you pay for, ill stick with a liquid liner.

name: Indigo Rose
review: I bought this gel eyeliner to try something new. I've used gel eyeliners before and never had an issue. This one just happened to be on sale and claims it lasts for 24 hours. This is probably the worst eyeliner I have ever used. The bottle and applicator are neat, the formula applies easily and is easy to put on. However, this stuff doesn't last. I use a concealer base and it smeared. I used an eyelid primer and it smeared. I used a makeup setter and it smeared. It doesn't even last half an hour and its almost gone. ESPECIALLY if you curl your eyelashes or use anything near the eyeliner that would brush against it. Hard to believe since it claims its also water proof! I've used dollar store stuff that lasted longer. This is definitely getting returned.

name: ms. smith
review: the only con is that it is difficult to apply if you are looking for a very thin line, otherwise it is fantastic!

name: J Rene
review: The ColorStay creme eyeliners stay on all day. You can workout and sweat, cry, and even get caught in the rain and the color stays on. It doesn't glide on as easily as some pencils but after you use it a while, you'll get used to applying it.

name: Anu
review: Nothing about this product is good.. Such a waste of money

name: carrie
review: product is kinda chunky; doesn't apply smoothly.

name: Dixie
review: Wish in was easier to get out of pot onto brush

name: Just me
review: I was looking for an eyeliner that could replace my expensive clinique. I wouldnt say that this is exactly the same, but its far closer than others that I have tried and a bit cheaper than what I was paying for clinique products! Especially since revlon frequently puts coupons in the paper and I can use the Ulta coupons also.

name: EJ
review: Love the Charcoal color. It last all day and it is easy to apply

name: Brich
review: I was having the classic issue with eyeliner where it was somewhat running during the day.  I'd look in the mirror and I would see black smudges under my eyes where there wasn't eyeliner . I read a review about Gel Eyeliner and tried this and I LOVE IT!  Does not smudge or run during the day.  It doesn't last all day, sometimes I have to reapply and it does take me longer to apply in the morning but...its worth the time to not have to worry about "looks like she went out drinking and didn't wash her face" look!  :)

name: Sexy buyer
review: I enyou this item, it works perfect with any eye shadow that I use and it brightnens my eyes.

name: Mistress Jackie
review: Great product, stays all day till you take it off. It is inexpensive. The only factor is it does try to clump when applying, if you are not proficient with liquid eyeliner you may want to try something else.

name: Jo
review: love this but i rather use the waterproof

name: RawkHawk
review: This is probably the easiest to apply gel liner I have ever used.  The consistency is is very easy to control and create multiple looks.  Slight fading by days end but I'm bad to touch my eyes throughout the day.  Great value

name: Trish
review: I was forced to buy this brand when I went to the store and found that the Rimmel brand is no longer in stores. I prefer the ones that look exactly like this. From the first time I put it on, I was not pleased. The color is dull and does not give a clean dramatic look that I love.

name: Monica
review: Use it everyday, light for work days, thicker, bold line for off days

name: WantsExtensions
review: Did not realize this was eyeliner to apply with a brush (did not read the description). I like the application of the eyeliner, but find it needs a second coat as it does not have that jet black look of actual liquid eyeliner.

name: tori
review: It stays on all day. the brush it comes with isn't very good tho, you dont get much control with it. but the gel itself is great. slightly difficult to put on or maybe it was just the brush.

name: A-Girl
review: The brush it comes with isn't fine enough to have any control. The product itself is too thick and clumpy to apply smoothly. If you happen to get it on how you like it does last. Pigmentation isn't too great unless you apply a lot of it.

name: busy mom
review: Faded throughout the day.

name: maritza
review: toooooo creamy and in 2 hours I got to retouch and I dont have greasy eyelids not worth it I regret buying it waist of money

name: Angel
review: It's my first gel eyeliner but I won't say its awesome but if you want to try. Gel eyeliner it's a good thing to start with, it's not that smooth and leaves little gaps in between while application but u can fill them in later and I don't find it jet black it's more of a dark charcoal.overall good buy

name: Cosmetic junkie
review: Found this product to be worthless. The brush, if that's what you want to call it, is awkward to use. The product doesn't apply evenly at all. I immediately returned it.

name: wife
review: i love gel eyeliners. and when i seen this product i thought i would love it, but i was wrong! i pretty much hate it! it's dry, terrible application, and does not last! i was very disappointed.

name: Wymzie
review: I would not recommend this to a friend.

name: k10
review:
I stupidly thought this was a liquid liner (what a dummy). It is actually a teeny tiny brush that you pull out then unscrew to get the gel liner.
All eyeliners (other than Lancome's artliner) smear on me. Took it back - but it was my stupidity on not reading the package correctly.

name: J Rene
review: This eyeliner stays on all day -- even in hot, humid weather. It's easy to make a thick line with this, but you can also make the line as thin as you like it by holding the brush at an angle. I had a slight learning curve to get the eyeliner the way I like it.

name: reddress
review: NO MATTER HOW YOU TRY TO DRAW A 'THIN' LINE, IT GETS ON YOUR LASHES AND THEN IT'S ALL UP UNDER YOUR EYES (RACOON EYES) AND YOU CAN'T WIPE IT OFF...IT JUST SMUDGES MORE...SO YOU HAVE TO BRING AN EYELINER REMOVER WITH YOU WHEN YOU GO OUT AND CONTINUE TO 'CLEAN, REAPPLY YOUR CONCEALER, AND REPEAT,,,,REPEAT.....ETC

name: TLL
review: Easy to apply. applicator is perfect. not runny. dries instantly. kinda like paint. even lines. love it

name: sarahlizx3
review: i have tried every liner out there! none even came close to this! my face doesnt hold make up well. for the past few months ive just been using black eye shadow as liner because i had given up. I saw this at [@] and decided to get it and i am so glad i did! i put it on this morning for work (10 am) and worked a 6 hour shift, then went home and took a nap, and then went on a date without having to touch it up at all! it is now midnight and it STILL looks amazing like i just put it on! and its a super dark black color which just looks amazing! Instead of the brush it comes with I use an angled liner brush which makes the outcome look even better and easier to control! Not hard to make a thin classic line or a thick dramatic line!

name: Chelle
review: This product is not really great as an eyeliner.  The brush is too thick to make a thin line and the gel liner isn't really dark enough for a liner.  It works okay as a dark eye shadow - but that's not what I bought it for.  Also, it is not hypo-allergenic.  It gave me a rash on my eyelids.

name: Raining Owl
review:
It's very easy to apply, lasts pretty much all day and night, but it's also easy to remove. The rich color lends to a very dramatic look.

The only thing that I don't like is that it irritates my contacts a bit more than my usual eyeliners.

name: Sophie
review: I bought this eyeliner nearly two years ago and I'm still far from running out. It doesn't dry over time as long as you close it properly. I wear winged eyeliner basically everyday. If you know how to apply gel liner, you should have no issue.. If I apply two coats, my eyeliner will stay in tact all night, even over a day sometimes, though don't go for that! I get asked how my eyeliner is still perfectly on all the time. I recommend periodically wiping the little brush with toilet paper to keep it fresh.

name: Awellman
review: The brush is thicker than what I expected. I usually do a thin liner and the brush is thick, when applying it went on as a dark grey not so black.

name: Rose
review: Have always used liquid liners. The Gel was dry, brush to thick, used other liner brushes I have. Tried for 3 days, takes way too long to apply filling in the gap's!

name: ColorMigraine
review:
I use eye drops often, with this eyeliner I dont care if I cry -artificially or emothionaly- I have all day perfect eyelined eyes.
I dont give it a 5 because the brush I got is disheveled.

name: Lin
review:
I always had problems with my eye liner rubbing off to the top of my lids. This eye liners does what
it says. Stays on all day. I am glad I decided to try.

name: Just me
review: It's ok

name: Steph
review: Doesn't go on easy and isn't a good bold black when applied

name: Chelsie
review: Not impressed with this eyeliner. I will stick with the pencil eye liner types

name: Kat
review: I LOVE this eyeliner! It stays really well and its pretty easy to apply. I set my eyeliner with black eyeshadow to add more color where its needed to make the eyeliner pop. This is my go to eyeliner and i highly recommend this.

name: Alyssa
review:
It's clumpy, but also doesn't have enough pigment, so you get dark blobs and then light spots that you need to go back over several times.
Kinda like when you are using a dry erase marker that is running out of ink and you go back over your line to darken it but it sort of erases itself so you go back over it again and now you have a patchy mess.

name: Crazy Crocheter
review: I'm "maturing" so putting eyeliner on isn't as easy as it used to be.  I need something that glides on better.  I love the feel and look of this product, but after a few hours, I have smudges and sparkle flecks under my eyes.  I will be conducting experiments to ensure that I'm not misusing the product, so don't let me dissuade you.  Like I said, I love how the product glides on, the applicator brush is soft but defines well, and the color is oh so pretty!

name: Amie
review: Awesome

name: Lauren
review: The design of the liner bottle is great. It helps avoid makeup bag messes.

name: hollywood17xx
review: What ever the product I buy and it says it is waterproof, I have yet to com across one that is surely 100% waterproof. This product is the same. However it does stay on very well, it is still not waterproof.

name: Lyssa marie
review: I just wish it came with an applier

name: Leila K-C
review: The product was okay but I had to use another brush to get a thin line. But it you like thick eyeliner this brush will be good.

name: Laura Loves Ulta
review: First time trying this kind of eyeliner and I loved it. I was always scared to try this kind thinking I wouldn't have a steady enough hand but it was surprisingly super easy to apply. Glides on easy, dries instantly and stays put all day. Went out and bought another color immediately after trying and this is my go to liner from now on. Also love how you can wear it thick or thin depending on your mood. Very versatile.

name: Pert Patty
review: do not like, would not waste my money again.

name: The Packers
review: This is the best eyeliner, it beats the expensive brands by far!  I am going back to get more colors!  Please don't discontinue this EVER!

name: ANSWER911
review: Great product, and for the price you can't beat it!

name: Girl next door
review: Love the color, stays on all day.

name: C
review: Not good

name: Wide Eyed Girl
review: It is hard to apply & doesn't last through the day.

name: Loreo
review: Could use a little harder tipped applicator.

name: Ashley
review: I like the product because its easy to apply but the dowside is that the charcoal color doesnt go on very dark and would require multiple applications to get desired darkness.

name: ck
review: This eyeliner is horrible.  It's too thick and the brush is too wide.  I returned it because it was so bad.

name: Carol the Perfectionist
review: This eyeliner definitely gives me a more defined makeup look.  It is dark enough to accent my eyelids.  It went on smoothly and easily.  If I put a bit too much on the brush, it came on too thick so I have to put less on the brush to get a thin line look.  Since it's waterproof, it stays on very well but it's difficult to remove even with the eye makeup remover lotion I use.

name: lee
review: Love this product

name: Sandgirl
review:
I like the purple color, but this eyeliner has so much glitter in it that it will get all over your face as soon as you put a tiny bit of eyeliner on your eye. It is very hard to remove because of the glitter, too.

The packaging is horrible, too, very difficult to open and use the first time, for no good reason.

This was a huge disappointment. If they had left out the giant chunks of glitter, I think I would be a fan for the price. However, since I never want to look like a Christmas ornament, this is a product I do not recommend [unless looking like a glittering Christmas ornament is your thing...].

name: Grace
review: Smooth texture and a good application brush

name: Pizi
review: Overall decent eyeliner just goes on lighter than I like.  Easy to use and stays on pretty good all day without having to reapply

name: Jujubee
review: Easy and not messy!

name: The Dish
review: Stays on even thru a crazy cardio workout!  No running or smearing....

name: MK
review: I love that the liner has it's own brush, easily goes on & then packs up to go! Wasn't sure what to expect, but this is a great liner!

name: BKL
review: Be careful when you apply, because if you miss a spot and try to reapply, it seems to take off the first color applied.  It is really soft in the bottle, so you don't have to use much pressure with the brush to load it.  Good color and lasted all day.

name: elly24
review: I would use this product everyday wear, easy, simple to use.

name: cheree03
review: I got this to use in my inner lid mostly.  The application there is hard because you cant get enough on the applicator or you get too much.  However i love it on the upper eyelid and it stays put.

name: Moffett
review: This liner is perfect for making your look of the moment. I can make a nice subtle  line for the office  and then bold it up for the night. Inexpensive and it lasts all day.

name: Kate
review: Best eyeliner I've ever had, hands down. Save your money, this beats high end eyeliners. Everyone looking to create a thinner line, just buy your own brush :) I've worn this eyeliner all day, fallen asleep in it and it still looks like it was just applied. No smudging/running, nothing. I've even taken a shower with it on, still looks PERFECT! But surprisingly it's not a pain to get off, I don't even use make up remover. Seriously my holy grail eyeliner.

name: Connie
review: I am not good at application and this is so easy -it truly glides on!

name: dodie
review: I need makeup that stays for hours without having to constantly retouch during the day. This meets that need.

name: Typh Makeup Addict
review: This is one of my favorite eyeliners. I love gel liners. I swap between this and Benefit they're real eyeliner. Depending on the type of line I want. I found to avoid clumps/dry out you have to do some up keep. Clean brush after each use and mix the gel before using. The only downside is after a long day (usually I wear mine for 10+ hrs) the outer corners crease a little. To avoid this I have touched up before going out for the evening.

name: Lisalove
review: The purple was a beautiful shade but applying the product was difficult. The tip of the liner tool was too thick. I have large eyes and relatively normal sized lids, however the clumping/inconsistency of the product and application brush were not a great match.

name: Minzy
review: Applying this product is difficult because it does not go on smoothly.

name: BETT
review:
Very difficult for me to use. Seems dry and flaky. Will not buy again.
Much prefer the liquids. Would also prefer a color more on the grey side(a slate or charcoal matte). Due to my age I not want such a hard harsh makeup.

name: Mayble
review: I bought this expecting something really good. What I found was just basic. I think it was reasonably priced. Not my favorite liner, I'll tell ya that! I have light features and I was expecting to be able to pull off a simple, natural look. I recommend this for someone that wants a dramatic look. PS. I bought this in the brown shade.

name: rubyred
review: I am older and this gel eyeliner is easier to apply than in a pencil or liquid form.

name: Ecmom
review: The best eyeliner out there!!

name: Kursti
review: Wouldn't buy again

name: Z
review: This eyeliner is really easy to apply and is a great deep color, but it flakes/runs pretty easily and after a short amount of time.
